company_top20 = df['Name'][:20]

#visualize top 20 of company name based on total sales

plt.xlabel('Total Sales', fontsize = 12)
plt.ylabel('Company Name', fontsize = 12)
plt.show()

#transform distribution of sales to normal distribution
figure(figsize = (8,4))
subplot(1,2,1)
hist(df['Sales'] * 1e-6, 20, color = 'r');
xlabel('Sales', fontsize = 12)

hist(log10(df['Sales']), 20);
xlabel('log10(Sales)', fontsize = 12)
